metadata.title: CVE-2024-13454 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Weak encryption algorithm in Easy-RSA version 3.0.5 through 3.1.7 allows alocal attacker to more easily bruteforce the private CA key when createdusing OpenSSL 3

criterions.comment: easy-rsa package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
